name: S L I M I N
name_original: S L I M I N
description:
SLIMIN (a game contest entry)

What do you get when you put Slime and slayin' together? Slimin'! get it...? The menu is a bit buggy so uuuh ignore dat. (If you found the easter egg your very cool) 

Oh no! Da evil slime king took your staff while u were chickeny ricey spicey and cheesy nuggets. u such a dumb dumb. now all you can do is jump on the butts of slimes. If the slimes don't appear refresh the page. Its probs a bug. If that doesnt work play here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/722640484/

Instructions

WASD or Arrow Keys or if your on mobile do your thing

Jump on slimes

Space to advance 

Beat the world record

Credits:

All the art was by me. 

All the sound effects by me.

There were bits of code which weren't by me. Here's the link to see who they were by: https://bit.ly/3T8uPm2
